title: Iran, Sanders Resignation & Hatch Act
itunes:title: Iran, Sanders Resignation & Hatch Act
description:
Guests include Norm Roule, Former CIA National Intelligence Manager for Iran and Senior Advisor, Counter Extremism Project and United Against Nuclear Iran, Capri Cafaro, Executive in Residence at American University, and Former Democratic minority leader, Ohio Senate, and Bill Faries, Bloomberg News National Security Team Leader. 

They discussed U.S. Secretary of State Michael Pompeo's comments on Iran, White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders leaving the Trump administration, and Kellyanne Conway under attack for Hatch Act violations.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
